US.tips1: It’s time to move… Anker and Ingress have combined forces to keep Agents on-the-go.
US.tips2: Gain the advantage for your faction with Anker’s portable charging technology.
US.tips3: Unite with us now to collect keys for the six-day giveaway.
US.prizeTips: We’re giving away 300 of each (100 per country). 900 prizes in total.
US.rules4: (4) Participants may enter each giveaway once.
US.rules5: (5) Collect giveaway Tickets to enter. More keys increases chances of winning.
US.rules6: (6) Anker reserves right of final explanation on the giveaway.
US.rules7: (7) Winners will be provided a $0.01 code, redeemable via Amazon.
